attributes.action: Scrap Sunday Trading  and increase the shopping hours on rest of the week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that people should  have a guaranteed day with the family. I feel that  the people of Britain need a common day off each week. Sunday should be a day when everyone including those who work in retail a chance to have chill out time.Sunday should be different to the rest of the week. So I urge the Prime Minister Keep Sunday free for everyone including  for those in retail and abolish the Sunday Trading Act.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
